text: Grand Rounds | Staff Data Platform Engineer | SF, CA| ONSITE | FULLTIME | https://grandrounds.com We are starting to build a near-real-time healthcare delivery and analysis platform to significantly change how healthcare is delivered. We are looking for experienced candidates to build this data platform using Kafka, Spark, Cassandra, Presto, and more. We've raised over $100M, are a small team of 12 data engineers and are looking to expand. If you want to work on something impactful and work in a mature startup environment, ping me at bashir@grandrounds.com or apply https://jobs.lever.co/grandrounds/2b58459d-a009-4d79-8eb7-4b...
